hero.name: Atha Rasyid
hero.tagline: Learn Much, Create Real, Stand Out
hero.description: Combining photography, design, coding, and artistic creativity into stunning masterpieces

about.title: About
about.subtitle: The journey of a creative technologist who continues to learn and create
about.storyP1: From Kalimantan to Depok, my journey is full of exploration. Photography taught me how to see the world from different perspectives, design gave me a way to turn imagination into cool visuals.
about.storyP2: Coding? It's the weapon to make all ideas real and interactive. The combination of the three makes me able to create without limits - from aesthetic product photos, user-friendly interface designs, to applications that solve real problems.
about.storyP3: For me, creativity is not just about art - but also about technology and how to use it to make an impact.
